column4: I just upgraded to U11.04.  Did not like Unity at all. When back to GNOME (aka "Ubuntu Classic).  Now I don't see compiz any more.  Since compiz is now part of Unity, does that mean that it is not available for GNOME?
unity is compiz plugin. compiz is there
where is the config menu for it then?
it's not installed by default. you need to install two apps to get it to show up
